name: 尼古拉·伊万诺维奇·罗巴切夫斯基
bio_short: 俄罗斯数学家，被誉为“几何学的哥白尼”。他是“非欧几里得几何学”（双曲几何）的共同创始人，通过否定欧几里得第五公设，开创了数学和物理学的新纪元。
bio_short_en: A Russian mathematician, known as the 'Copernicus of Geometry'. He was a co-founder of 'Non-Euclidean Geometry' (Hyperbolic Geometry), pioneering a new era in mathematics and physics by negating Euclid's fifth postulate.
